channel.title: Stereofield - Alone (Surf Remix) [Drum & Bass] :soundcloud:
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/surfmusicinc/stereofield-alone-surf-remix
I’m so glad I made this remix. The original was so good, and I feel like not changing too much would work better. I hope you guys enjoy this!

item.title: Stereofield - Alone (Surf Remix) [Drum & Bass] :soundcloud:
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
This is probably one of the few exceptions where someone changed something and it turned out just as good (for other reasons) as the original.

(it’s a Zimmer remix turned melodic dubstep)

Read full topic

item.title: Stereofield - Alone (Surf Remix) [Drum & Bass] :soundcloud:
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
foryou:

The original was so good, and I feel like not changing too much would work better.

If I remixed Hans Zimmer, I wouldn’t change anything!

item.title: Stereofield - Alone (Surf Remix) [Drum & Bass] :soundcloud:
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Yes I did enjoy it. very noice. I’d prefer the drums to be less buried, but that’s pretty much how the drums were in the original track so…

Perhaps it would be more fitting to call it a Bootleg since it’s pretty grounded in the original.
